thoughts.text: The 'browse_website' command returned an error, so I will use the 'execute_shell' command to check if I have an internet connection.
thoughts.reasoning: If I am unable to connect to the internet, then I will not be able to browse any websites. Using the 'execute_shell' command to check my internet connection will allow me to quickly determine if this is the issue.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'execute_shell' command to check if I have an internet connection
- If I do not have an internet connection, troubleshoot the issue
- If I do have an internet connection, try using the 'browse_website' command again
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am troubleshooting the issue thoroughly if I do not have an internet connection, as there may be multiple factors contributing to the issue.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'execute_shell' command to check if I have an internet connection and troubleshoot the issue if necessary.
